    • Method Detail

      • remove

        public static <T> T[] remove(T[] original,
                             T element)
        Removes an element from the array without mutating the original.
        If the element is not present in the array according to Object#equals, the original array is returned.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the array
        Parameters:
        original - the source array
        element - to be removed
        Returns:
        a new array with the specified element removed

      • add

                          T element)
        Adds an element to the array without mutating the original.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the array
        Parameters:
        original - the source array
        element - to be added
        Returns:
        a new array with the specified element added

      • addIfNotPresent

        public static <T> T[] addIfNotPresent(T[] original,
                                      T element)
        Scans the array to determine if the specified element is present according to Object#equals.
        If not, appends the element according to add(Object[], Object)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the array
        Parameters:
        original - the source array
        element - the element to add
        Returns:
        a new array if the element did not match

      • convert

        public static <T> Collection<T> convert(T[] original)
        Converts the array to an unbacked Collection
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the array
        Parameters:
        original - the source array
        Returns:
        a collection
